description:
A different way of reading stories. Simple and attractive, with full color illustrations and fun music. Drink a potion and change the language, learn while enjoying one of the best classic tales in the world.

• Full color illustrations
• Animated interactive book
• Fun music
• A story for the little ones
• Touch screen compatibility
name: Tom Thumb: Interactive Book
intro: The adventures of little Tom Thumb. Interactive classic stories for all ages.
